name: tolltrack_sa
description: A comprehensive web application for tracking and managing toll gate expenses on South African roads. Built with Bun, Elysia, React, and Tailwind CSS.

scripts.dev: bun run --bun concurrently "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:client"
scripts.build:server: cd server && bun build main.ts --outdir dist --target bun
scripts.type-check: cd client && bun run type-check && cd ../server && bun run type-check
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd server && bun install && cd ../client && bun install
